lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
You enter the school spelling bee.
Because you have already shown remarkable intellectual potential, you win easily. Intellectual sphere gains even more. (By the way, the winning word was "synecdoche".)
Because you have already shown some intellectual promise, you take third place. (The word you missed was "synecdoche.")
Your Intellectual sphere is not yet developed enough for you to make a good showing in this event. Better luck next time.
